title: MicroProfile 6.0

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
Specifications:

- [x] Config 3.0.2 - same as MP 5.0
- [x] JWT 2.1 - new version - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/30897 & https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/30775
- [x] Fault Tolerance 4.0.2 - same as MP 5.0
- [x] Health 4.0.1 - same as MP 5.0
- [x] OpenAPI 3.1 - new version - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/30883 & https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/29815
- [x] REST Client 3.0.1 - same as MP 5.0
- [x] ~~OpenTracing - **removed**~~
- [x] ~~Metrics 5.0.0 - new version - not supported~~
- [x] OpenTelemetry Tracing 1.0 - **new specification** - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/31081
